page.title: 13TIMSBURY FEMALE FASHIONS(1)
page.content: This survey looked at three different age groups in a systematic way:girls of primary school age,girls of secondary school age,and women up to middle-age.Timsbury school-children helped us,together with Timsbury Girl Guides,staff and parents. Altogether,we looked at hats, shoes,colours,clothes,belts,make-up, socks and tights,latest fashion, earrings and jewellery. {Jewellery. We found that the children preferred plastic to expensive jewellery,and also that that the adults all preferred the expensive. {Earrings.} These were not popular with the adults,least of all hoop earrings. The children and the teenagers loved all earrings.{(continued). { By Naomi,Gaenor,Rebecca and Juliette.
